FuncDef: The reset ethernet uni statistics interface command clears traffic statistics on an EVC Layer 2 sub-interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ethernet uni statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1.1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
reset ethernet uni statistics interface interface-type interface-number.subinterface-number
Prerequisites
An EVC Layer 2 sub-interface has been created using the interface interface-type interface-number.subnum mode l2 command in the system view.
